duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead hands-on day-to-day operations in GL nonprofit accounting operations and financial forecasting.
Process improvement, developing multi-year forecasts, improving internal controls, and mentoring a dynamic team.

Manage the Finance Department and oversee fund accounting, accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, fixed assets, general ledger, financial statements, cost centers, chart of accounts & distribution.
Oversee cash flow management, fund accounting management, and fixed asset analysis.
Lead and coach the Finance team, establish policies, processes, and internal controls, and ensure high-level organization and timely results.
Collaborate with internal stakeholders including Directors of other departments, lead audits, and work in an environment promoting compassion, service, and social justice.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Accounting, or Finance. Certified Public Accountant designation or Master's degree in Business Administration, Accounting, Finance, or similar equivalent preferred.
